definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo explore the changes of shape and structure of the middle turbinate in two nostrils with a deviated nasal septum.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较鼻中隔偏曲患者双侧中鼻甲形态结构的改变。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a new method of septal cartilage augmentation for hump nose plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍用鼻中隔软骨充填整复驼峰鼻的方法。

sentences.english: The septum articulates caudally with the anterior nasal spine.
sentences.chinese: 鼻中隔的尾侧端与前鼻棘相接。

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the advantages of septoplasty by nasal endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 探讨鼻代写职称论文内镜下鼻中隔成形术的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To explore a new treatment to repair perforation of nasal septum with free mucosa of nasal bottom.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究应用游离鼻底黏膜修补鼻中隔穿孔的效果。

sentences.english: Objective: To investigate the correlation of the nasal sinusitis with nasal septum deviation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻中隔偏曲与慢性鼻窦炎的相关性。

sentences.english: To evaluate the clinical value of septoplasty applied in nasal septum deviation under nasal endoscope.
sentences.chinese: 评价鼻内窥镜下鼻中隔偏曲成形术的临床应用价值。

sentences.english: This is more often seen with a deviated septum or enlarged adenoids.
sentences.chinese: 这是更经常看到一个鼻中隔偏曲或扩大腺样体。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between deviation of nasal septal and asthma.
sentences.chinese: 目的初步探讨鼻中隔偏曲与支气管哮喘的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To explore an ideal procedure for the treatment of nasal septum fracture in emergency management.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨提高急诊期鼻中隔骨折诊治效果的方法。

sentences.english: It usually takes place bilaterally. However, tuberculum septum may be seen as a complication of chronic sinusitis.
sentences.chinese: 鼻中隔结节可作为慢性鼻窦炎的一个并发症。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss the clinical use of nasal airflow measurement in septoplasty.
sentences.chinese: 探讨鼻腔气流测定在鼻中隔偏曲矫正术中的应用价值。

definition: the wing of the nose/ala nasi
